missions.name: Turn off your room lights during the day

missions.proofCaption: Turned off my bedroom lamp, I opened the window to get a natural light source instead.

missions.name: Draw a circle on your forehead
missions.description: Attach the proof by submitting a photo of your forehead with a massive permanent circle mark.
